html: 1.21.21  1:01 am   what font do you use in your videos
1.21.21  12:12 am   What's Washington DC like?

1.20.21  11:36 pm   Do you just arbitrarily select lyrics and ideas,

      or is there a method to the madness?
1.20.21  11:27 pm   Should I start writing a novel?
1.20.21  11:06 pm   in here comes the sun, you say "and sadness comes closer" while the animation shows a smiling face approaching the camera. what does this mean?
1.20.21  10:49 pm   what mic do you use for recording vocals?

1.20.21  10:36 pm   I remember hearing that when you first started to fully write music, you made lots of big lists or something like that with all of your song ideas. I'm wondering if you've finished with those/

      started to write new songs from scratch?
1.20.21  10:35 pm   do you work at oh yeah corp?
1.20.21  10:26 pm   Was it intentional to leave your last video as "might quit" to terrify people coming to your page?

1.20.21  10:15 pm   Your reality videos really intrigue me, but I've always wondered, what motivates you to make them? A lot of people would feel vulnerable/awkward putting their partially coherent ideas from several years ago up for anyone to see. Does this bother you?

      Is it weird to go back and watch them several years later for editing?

      P.S. You seem like a cool dude and your latest video is pretty rad. Are there plans for a regular schedule in the future?

      I saw that you said you like to post weekly on another question, is that a possibility at the moment? Thanks :)
1.20.21  10:14 pm   how do i get ur songs out of my head make it stop man

1.20.21  9:48 pm   How did you learn to compose music and make animation?

     Were you self-taught,

      or did you take classes?
1.20.21  9:17 pm   We all know Steve's name isn't Steve, but what is his name?
1.20.21  9:03 pm   does the process of animating the music video change the song itself or do you only start animating once the song is complete and simply animate around the music?

1.20.21  8:45 pm   In your song "La de da de da de da de day oh"
Does the line "When did all the windmills start to turn so slow?" Have any real world significance. I don't know why but it just seemed like a deep line, wanted to know your thoughts
1.20.21  8:30 pm   are you gonna make more songs?
1.20.21  8:28 pm   what's a good trick to remember to drink water throughout the day?

1.20.21  8:20 pm   Do you ever feel like you're obligated to create because of the pedestal people put you on?

     I'm sure the big numbers can be scary
1.20.21  8:18 pm   Have you ever considered being a comedian?

1.20.21  8:09 pm   In here comes the sun at 0:45 on "sure", how do you approach blending/mixing the vocals, (especially with the half-step between 3 and 4)?

      Also what do you call this chord?
1.20.21  8:00 pm   Was the plan to eliminate potential questions when you put the text "this is my favorite part of the video" in here comes the sun?
1.20.21  7:09 pm   What advice can you give to someone who wants to create things but is constantly demotivated during the creative process to the point of giving up for weeks to months at a time?
1.20.21  7:04 pm   when was the last time you pressed the shift key
1.20.21  6:51 pm   What's your favorite jingle you've ever made?

1.20.21  5:48 pm   When you do your 'narration chords' (when you harmonise words/phrases like 'hire a  samurai' or 'the sun is a deadly laser), are you thinking about an overall chord progression? Does the chord or key of a word influence the one after it?

1.20.21  5:40 pm   Why didn't you upload any videos in 2020 quarantine?

     There was plenty of time to do a lot of things

1.20.21  4:07 pm   One thing I find fascinating about your videos or songs is how their meaning can be interpreted different every time you listen to them, for example, I'm best friends with my own front door. Was this intentional or do you try to stick with one meaning?
1.20.21  4:04 pm   What was the weirdest song you made?
1.20.21  3:36 pm   Will you make more music?

1.20.21  3:09 pm   Could you describe what drives you to be prolific?

      And how does one manage to stay prolific, and also produce quality with quantity?

     What about that fear of never finishing it all before you die? I am struggling with these thoughts.

1.20.21  3:00 pm   You've said, and I'm paraphrasing here, that you just started with making 1 second video's, and you made them better and better, and only then you started extending the length of the video's.
This way a lot of your progress was publicly visible. Why did you decide to wait almost two years now before sharing anything of your progress in the graphics department? 

pressure
